name: Berry Bat
description:
Go on an up in the air adventure with your bat looking for its berries. How many fangs can you get along the way? Fly through caves, forests and city skylines whilst your heart races avoiding deadly obstacles!

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

Berry Bat  was created for a final year game design and implementation module. Students are tasked with designing and creating a mobile game for Android mobile devices. This is a solo project that tests students' design, C# + Unity and artistic skills.

CONTROLS

  • Tap the screen to flap. That's it.

REQUIREMENTS

  • Android device

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 1 x Level 6 Student  

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
